alert.note: Alert for Westmoreland; Westmoreland Ridges (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 12 at 1:36PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Portions of east central Ohio, including the following areas, Carroll, Columbiana, Harrison, Jefferson OH and Tuscarawas. Portions of Pennsylvania, including the following areas, Allegheny, Beaver, Butler, Higher Elevations of Westmoreland, Lawrence, Washington and Westmoreland. Portions of West Virginia, including the following areas, Brooke, Hancock and Ohio. * WHEN...Through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Thunderstorms with heavy rainfall are expected this afternoon and evening. Given last nights heavy rainfall, the threat of flash flooding is higher due to saturated soils. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
